agave_uri.description: A SD2 Agave API files reference (optional)

circuit.description: A logic circuit enum for this sbh_uri, if available (e.g. a strain)

input_state.description: An input state enum for this sbh_uri, if available (e.g. a strain)

predicted_circuit_state.description: A predicted circuit state enum for this sbh_uri, if available (e.g. a strain)

input_state_labels.description: Human readable labels for the elements that map to the input state

input_state_uris.description: URIs for the elements that map to the input state

lab_id.description: The original value specified by the provider
